Orlo Admin Bootstrap
UI Kit Pro Edition

Orlo Admin UI Kit Pro is a premiun quality, Bootstrap based UI Kit built by team at ORLO.

  • UI Kit Pro is a premium quality, Bootstrap based UI Kit built by the team at Start Bootstrap. Here's what you get when you purchase Orlo UI Kit Pro:
    • Bootstrap 5 - This professional UI kit theme has been updated to use the new Bootstrap 5 framework!
    • 12 Landing Page Layouts - Our variety of landing page layouts gives you the perfect starting point for any UI project. You can see them all in our live demo!
    • 19 Prebuilt Pages - Some of the most common page needs for modern web apps are available with this UI Kit. Get a head start on company pages, support pages, portfolios, blogs, and more!
    • Customizable Header Styles - For all other pages, we have customizable header styles to help you build custom views to fit your exact needs.
    • HTML & CSS Files - The compiled HTML and CSS files are the backbone of this theme, which makes the theme itself a perfect option for integrating into your framework of choice, or to serve up as static HTML files after customization!
    • Regular Updates - At Start Bootstrap, we've been committed to keeping our products updated and bug free since 2013.
